error-message.description: Specify error message displayed when 'error' property is set to 'true'.

error-icon.description: Name of icon from NovaIcons. Make sure you have the icon library installed

success-icon.description: Name of icon from NovaIcons. Make sure you have the icon library installed

hint.description: Display hint for under the default slot.

default.description: Default slot can be used for NCheckbox or NRadio components.
